name: ChatterGroups

methods.name: addMember
methods.signature: public static ConnectApi.GroupMember addMember(String communityId, String groupId, String userId)
methods.description: Add a user to a group as a standard member.

methods.name: addMemberWithRole
methods.signature: public static ConnectApi.GroupMember addMemberWithRole(String communityId, String groupId, String userId, ConnectApi.GroupMembershipType role)
methods.description: Add a user with a role to a group.

methods.name: addRecord
methods.signature: public static ConnectApi.GroupRecord addRecord(String communityId, String groupId, String recordId)
methods.description: Associate a record with a group.

methods.name: createGroup
methods.signature: public static ConnectApi.ChatterGroupDetail createGroup(String, communityId, ConnectApi.ChatterGroupInput groupInput)
methods.description: Create a group.

methods.description: Delete the group banner photo.

methods.description: Delete a group.

methods.description: Remove a member from a group.

methods.name: deletePhoto

methods.description: Delete the group photo.

methods.description: Get a page of groups.

methods.description: Get a page of groups with an archive status.

methods.description: Get the context user’s Chatter settings for a group.

methods.description: Get the photo for a group.

methods.description: Update a request to join a private group.

methods.description: Update a request to join a private group and optionally provide a message when the request is denied.

methods.name: setTestSearchGroups
methods.signature: public static Void setTestSearchGroups(String communityId, String q, ConnectApi.ChatterGroupPage result)
methods.description: Register a ConnectApi.ChatterGroupPage object to be returned when the matching ConnectApi.searchGroups method is called in a test context. Use the test method with the same parameters or you receive an exception.

methods.name: setTestSearchGroups
methods.signature: public static Void setTestSearchGroups(String communityId, String q, Integer pageParam, Integer pageSize, ConnectApi.ChatterGroupPage result)
methods.description: Register a ConnectApi.ChatterGroupPage object to be returned when the matching ConnectApi.searchGroups method is called in a test context. Use the test method with the same parameters or you receive an exception.

methods.name: setTestSearchGroups
methods.signature: public static Void setTestSearchGroups(String communityId, String q, ConnectApi.GroupArchiveStatus, archiveStatus, Integer pageParam, Integer pageSize, ConnectApi.ChatterGroupPage result)
methods.description: Register a ConnectApi.ChatterGroupPage object to be returned when the matching ConnectApi.searchGroups method is called in a test context. Use the test method with the same parameters or you receive an exception.

description: Information about groups, such as the group’s members,
